name: CaterPanic!
description:
NOTE: DOWNLOAD RECOMMENDED BEST PLAYED IN FULL SCREEN CaterPanic is a fast-paced platformer where you have to adapt to your environment to survive! You play as a caterpillar with the ability to evolve/devolve itself to match its surroundings, allowing it to traverse the terrain and escape the all-consuming wildfire chasing close behind. Mutate between the Caterpillar, Butterfly, and Fish body to stay clear of the wildfire and traverse the environment efficiently! Utilise your platforming skills and quick thinking to stay ahead!  This game was made in 7 days for the GoGodot 3 Game Jam. The theme for this jam was 'Evolution'. Controls/Rules:
  • Arrow keys or WASD and Space to move
  • You can only Evolve after passing through an Evolution Portal
  • Q To Evolve into a Butterfly
  • E To Evolve into a Caterpillar
  • R to Evolve into a Fish
  • F to reset
  • Reach the escape portal safely to win the level!
